changeSet.author: Defra
changeSet.createView: select cat.id as id, sub.season as season, cat.activity_id as activity_id, cat.date_caught as date_caught, cat.species_id as species_id, cat.method_id as method_id, cat.released as released, cat.mass_kg as mass from rcr_catch cat inner join rcr_activity act on (cat.activity_id = act.id and not cat.reporting_exclude) inner join rcr_submission sub on (act.submission_id = sub.id and not sub.reporting_exclude);

changeSet.author: Defra
changeSet.createView: select sc.id as id, sub.season as season, sc.activity_id as activity_id, sc.month as month, 2 as species_id, sc.released as released from rcr_small_catch sc inner join rcr_activity act on (sc.activity_id = act.id and not sc.reporting_exclude) inner join rcr_submission sub on (not sub.reporting_exclude and act.submission_id = sub.id);

changeSet.author: Defra
changeSet.createView: select concat(sc.id, '_', counts.method_id) as id, sub.season as season, counts.small_catch_id as small_catch_id, counts.method_id as method_id, counts.count as count from rcr_small_catch_counts counts inner join rcr_small_catch sc on (counts.small_catch_id = sc.id) inner join rcr_activity act on (sc.activity_id = act.id and not sc.reporting_exclude) inner join rcr_submission sub on (not sub.reporting_exclude and act.submission_id = sub.id)
